items.question: How does AI personalization work?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes your preferences, writing style, and usage patterns to suggest personalized designs, layouts, and features that match your needs.

items.question: What materials do you use?
items.answer: We use premium, sustainable materials including recycled paper, eco-friendly inks, and responsibly sourced leather for our covers.

items.question: Do you ship internationally?
items.answer: Yes, we ship to over 15 countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location.

items.question: Can I customize existing designs?
items.answer: Absolutely! All our products can be customized with your preferred colors, layouts, and personal touches through our AI design tool.

items.question: What's your return policy?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with your purchase, we'll provide a full refund or replacement.
